recipesJson.name: Gallagher's Ice Pop | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, folkart, and ID10-T . 
This recipe is our version of a watermelon, lime, frozen popsicle. We were going for something fresh, crisp, and cold, and I think we hit the mark. Full Development Notes on DEVELOPED Ep. 19 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qX0xfpUui5U
Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY

reviews.text: Really good recipe. Very refreshing stuff
Awesome. I'm not a fan of cooling, so I mix without it, but it is still really very good.

I have not been a fan of watermelon vapes, but this recipe made me a convert.   The lime and cream really made a difference and the mix is more of a sherbet to me than a candied watermelon.  I am going to try this with a raspberry as well.

Tried it without hibiscus, kinda thin. Subbed in sweet currant at the same % it was better than without.   Later on, I got the hibiscus in and made another batch, was an improvement over both.  Overall, good mix thanks for sharing.

It's so refreshing to have a really good watermelon dominant recipe. The balance between the lime and watermelon is just superb boys. I love what the flv cream and vt fizzy sherbet bring to the mix as well. I am not a huge fan of fruit mixes but I've been vaping this nonstop since I mixed it. Good Job!
